channel.title: Project-Nemesis 718/742 | Boss Slayer | Achievement Diaries | Looking for Staff!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4902169/banner.png[/img]
Hello Rune-Server, I'm the developer of Project-Nemesis 718 server. I've been developing this for the past 1,5 months and I've learned alot! Note that we're still under development so lots of content are still being added...
Actively looking for staff!
We here in Project-Nemesis strive to make content that is enjoyable for our players to play. We have the idea putting our community first and adding content which is chosen by our players!
[URL=http://"http://project-nemesis.co.nf/"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://project-nemesis.co.nf/forums/index.php"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/content_link/wfGpMPPab4K0jdVHyY8rhrRKAnAex9vrUQ0EdEM37iHaqNjyKDCl3QhcGeQPTV3D?dl=1"]Download Client[/URL]
[B]Some features we have[/B] All 24 skills working Custom Dungeoneering T90 weapons Fully working Slayer system Boss Slayer system Achievement Diaries PvM point system Pk point system Automated Donations Boss Pets Master capes Minigames Active and friendly staff Stable xp and drop rates Friendly players Daily Updates
I could go on and on but I'll just show you
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vqvm2mZ.png[/img]
[B]Choose your play-style![/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4C9vv8N.png[/img]
[B]Collect all of the Boss Pets![/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nEgpQZ2.jpg[/img]
[B]Boss assignments![/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zj0Kkl1.png[/img]
[B]Wilderness Bosses[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7WlWcj3.png[/img]
[B]Achievement Diaries[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RJP9YiD.png[/img]
[B]Completionist cape requirements[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iYjxEv5.png[/img]
[B]Video[/B]
[video=youtube;p_0b-_favJk]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p_0b-_favJk[/video]
[ADMIN=And alot more! Why don't you come and check us out yourself? Client is downloadable at our forums You don't need to register, just create a new account and play!
Hope to see you on
Sincerely, Dewwie
Thank you[/CENTER]
[B]Credits Matrix Team Jordan Enth_ Dewwie[/B]

item.title: Project-Nemesis 718/742 | Boss Slayer | Achievement Diaries | Looking for Staff!
item.dc:creator: @DragonfallZero DragonfallZero
item.description:
@DragonfallZero wrote:

[CENTER]

Hello Rune-Server, I’m the developer of Project-Nemesis 718 server. I’ve been developing this for the past 1,5 months and I’ve learned alot!
Note that we’re still under development so lots of content are still being added…

Actively looking for staff!

We here in Project-Nemesis strive to make content that is enjoyable for our players to play. We have the idea putting our community first and adding content which is chosen by our players!

Website
Forums
Download Client

Some features we have
All 24 skills working
Custom Dungeoneering
T90 weapons
Fully working Slayer system
Boss Slayer system
Achievement Diaries
PvM point system
Pk point system
Automated Donations
Boss Pets
Master capes
Minigames
Active and friendly staff
Stable xp and drop rates
Friendly players
Daily Updates

I could go on and on but I’ll just show you

Choose your play-style!

Collect all of the Boss Pets!

nEgpQZ2.jpg1223×801

Boss assignments!

Wilderness Bosses

Achievement Diaries

Completionist cape requirements

Video

[video=youtube;p_0b-_favJk]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p_0b-_favJk[/video]

[ADMIN=And alot more!
Why don’t you come and check us out yourself?
Client is downloadable at our forums
You don’t need to register, just create a new account and play!

Hope to see you on

Sincerely, Dewwie

Thank you[/CENTER]
